Can you build a pergola with pressure treated lumber? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 4): Yes you can. It’ll last longer being exposed to the elements. Some pressure treated lumber is still ‘wet’ from recently having been treated. I’d steer away from that. And use gloves so you don’t get the stuff they treat the lumber with on your hands.

t: material for a pergola: cypress or pressure treated lumber
s: One of the hardest parts of the whole job was picking out the best pieces from the stack. The 6x6's weigh about 100 pounds each but we found 11 that were very good. Even those pieces had knots and checks so I used Minwaxws wood filler (2 part system) to fill all that stuff in.
